recipe.title: Roasted Tomato and Basil Relish
ingredients: 1 pound plum tomatoes, seeded, very coarsely chopped
1/2 cup chopped fresh basil or 1 tablespoon dried
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Combine all ingredients in 1-quart casserole. Bake until tomatoes are soft, about 30 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Cool to room temperature.
